ABOUTME.workTogetherText: Welcome to my site! As a front-end developer specializing in JavaScript and Angular, I bring a unique perspective to the world of web design. My roots in digital marketing allow me to create not only technically sophisticated, but also strategically thought-out web presences. I look forward to working with you to develop innovative solutions and turn your visions into reality.

MYWORK.myWorkDescription: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
MYWORK.projectDescription: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

CONTACT.contactDescription: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
CONTACT.contactFormEnd: and agree to processing of my data as outlined.
